events.text:
Oh would you look at that! 
A glass of water! 
At least he always knew to keep hydrated.
Crypts below, Alora! That's what you're taking from this?

I mean staying hydrated does allow you to outlive most people. 
Ooo he even put lemon juice in it! How fancy!

Ah yes, I do believe he started planting a garden, not limited to lemon trees, out in the backyard.
If memory serves he picked up that hobby to teach someone else.
Well isn't that fun and fresh!
